RiakAPI Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

The Riak API for PHP allows you to connect to a Riak instance, create, modify, and delete Riak objects, add and remove links from Riak objects, run Javascript (and Erlang) based Map/Reduce operations, and run Linkwalking operations.

See the unit_tests.php file for example usage.
